plot: After not getting any success of importance with the company of varieties which has toured throughout Spain, singer Raphael decided to leave and go to Madrid looking for record win. In his early days, he lives surrounded by actors, painters and musicians, ultimately, Bohemian who dream of the triumph. Some morning sings in a radio broadcast for housewives and there meets Lina, a famous journalist who cares for him. Thereafter it will change their destiny...
title: Cuando tú no estás
